=== Roadmap ===

Here you should provide a list of things you plan on doing. Include links to where these are discussed online and on mailing lists.

* ''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PNWTeam/projects/LibraryDist|Library Distribution]]</nowiki>'' - Aimed toward getting Ubuntu on library shelves.
* ''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PNWTeam/projects|Web Portal]]</nowiki>'' - Working on getting a web portal system up and running so users can demo Ubuntu with out having to obtain a CD.
* ''<nowiki>[[http://www.softwarefreedomday.org|Software Freedom Day]]</nowiki>'' - <nowiki>[[http://www.softwarefreedomday.org/teams/northamerica/OR/Portland|Portland, OR]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.softwarefreedomday.org/teams/northamerica/WA/Seattle|Seattle, WA]]</nowiki>
